page.title: 08Recreation
page.content: {Recreation Centre} 53 families make use of the recreation centre. 13 fathers and 19 mothers make use of the facilities regularly,36 don't use the centre at all. {Swimming } Amongst the children the primary hobby was swimming.67 children used the local swimming pool out of 89 families questioned.In only 14 families the parents and children went to the pool together. {Library} Of the 89 households,74 used the library. In 32 of the families only the children used it. 37 mothers and 11 fathers claimed to use the library.67 children used library tickets.
